info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 6 at 9:16AM CDT until June 9 at 5:57AM CDT by NWS Springfield MO
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Springfield MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri...
Current River near Powder Mill affecting Shannon County.
Jacks Fork at Alley Spring affecting Shannon County.
For the Current River...including Powder Mill...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Jacks Fork River...including Alley Spring...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Current River near Powder Mill.
* WHEN...From late tonight to early Monday morning.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CDT Friday the stage was 5.8 feet. - Bankfull stage is 8.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 11.0 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 930 AM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY MONDAY MORNING
